title: Brittle Manufacturing Quality Engineer
summary: Apple is a place where extraordinary people gather to do their best work. Just be ready to dream big. The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Imagining what you could do here. At Apple, creative ideas have a way of becoming wonderful products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there’s no telling what you could accomplish.
description: Responsible for developing, applying, revising, and maintaining quality standards for processing materials, solving complex quality engineering problems in creative and effective ways. Has a solid understanding and supplier management abilities in area of quality and reliability, and general manufacturing operations business management relative to all functional groups. Collaborate with other Apple functional groups as resources to optimize suppliers quality programs...
preferred_qualifications: BS, MS or PhD in mechanical, manufacturing or industrial engineering. Oversea education background is preferred.
